argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | coe1sfi.a | |- A = ( coe1 ` F ) |
| 2 |  | coe1sfi.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 3 |  | coe1sfi.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 4 |  | coe1sfi.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | coe1fvalcl.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 5 | #P_coe1f | |- ( F e. B -> A : NN0 --> K ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` R ) e. _V |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eqeltri | |- K e. _V |
| 9 |  | #P_nn0ex | |- NN0 e. _V |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( K e. _V /\ NN0 e. _V ) |
| 11 |  | #P_elmapg | |- ( ( K e. _V /\ NN0 e. _V ) -> ( A e. ( K ^m NN0 ) <-> A : NN0 --> K ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_mp1i | |- ( F e. B -> ( A e. ( K ^m NN0 ) <-> A : NN0 --> K ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_mpbird | |- ( F e. B -> A e. ( K ^m NN0 ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_coe1sfi | |- ( F e. B -> A finSupp .0. ) |
| 15 |  | #P_breq1 | |- ( g = A -> ( g finSupp .0. <-> A finSupp .0. ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_elrab | |- ( A e. { g e. ( K ^m NN0 ) | g finSupp .0. } <-> ( A e. ( K ^m NN0 ) /\ A finSupp .0. ) ) |
| 17 | 13, 14, 16 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( F e. B -> A e. { g e. ( K ^m NN0 ) | g finSupp .0. } ) |
